com.mlt.mkt.servers.dukascopy

Class DkCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.mkt.servers.dukascopy.DkCore

  • public class DkCore
extends java.lang.Object
    Dukascopy core. This is the only class that contains Dukascopy objects as well as conversions to/from Dukascopy/System classes.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
